mapper.select: SELECT edoc_type edocType, edoc_form_title edocFormTitle, edoc_form_desc edocFormDesc, edoc_form_create_date edocFormCreateDate, edoc_form_update_date edocFormUpdateDate FROM edoc_form_type

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edoc JOIN emp ON edoc_writer = emp_code JOIN edoc_approval app ON app.edoc_num = edoc.edoc_num JOIN edoc_form_type etype ON edoc.edoc_type = etype.edoc_type WHERE app.approver = #{empCode}
AND edoc.edoc_done_date IS NULL AND app.appr_status = '0'
AND edoc.edoc_done_date IS NULL AND edoc.edoc_status != '0' AND app.appr_status != '0'
AND app.appr_status != '0'

SELECT edoc.edoc_enroll_date edocEnrollDate, edoc.edoc_num edocNum, edoc.edoc_status edocStatus, edoc.edoc_title edocTitle, edoc.edoc_type edocType, edoc.edoc_done_date edocDoneDate, edoc.file_name fileName, ef.original_file_name edocOriginalfileName, etype.edoc_form_title edocFormTitle, emp.emp_code writerEmpCode, emp.emp_kor_name edocWriter, team.team_name teamName, appr1.approver approver1, appr1.appr_order apprOrder1, appr1.appr_status apprStatus1, appr1.appr_reason apprReason1, DATE_FORMAT(appr1.appr_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m') apprDate1, IFNULL(appr2.approver, 'none') approver2, appr2.appr_order apprOrder2, IFNULL(appr2.appr_status, -1 ) apprStatus2, appr2.appr_reason apprReason2, DATE_FORMAT(appr2.appr_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m') apprDate2 FROM edoc JOIN emp ON edoc_writer = emp_code JOIN team ON emp.team_code = team.team_code JOIN edoc_form_type etype ON edoc.edoc_type = etype.edoc_type LEFT JOIN edoc_approval appr1 ON edoc.edoc_num = appr1.edoc_num AND appr1.appr_order = '1' LEFT JOIN edoc_approval appr2 ON edoc.edoc_num = appr2.edoc_num AND appr2.appr_order = '2' LEFT JOIN edoc_file ef ON edoc.file_name = ef.file_name WHERE edoc.edoc_num = #{edocNum} AND( emp.emp_code = #{empCode} OR appr1.approver = #{empCode} OR appr2.approver = #{empCode} )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edoc JOIN edoc_form_type etype ON edoc.edoc_type = etype.edoc_type WHERE edoc.edoc_writer = #{empCode}
AND edoc.edoc_done_date IS NULL
AND edoc.edoc_done_date IS NOT NULL AND( edoc.edoc_status = '1' OR edoc.edoc_status = '2' )
AND( edoc.edoc_status = '-1' )

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(prop_start_date,'%Y년 %m월 %d일') propStartDate, DATE_FORMAT(prop_end_date,'%Y년 %m월 %d일') propEndDate, prop_title propTitle, prop_content propContent FROM edoc_draft WHERE edoc_num = #{edocNum}

SELECT vac_type vacType, DATE_FORMAT(vac_start_date,'%Y년 %m월 %d일') vacStartDate, DATE_FORMAT(vac_end_date,'%Y년 %m월 %d일') vacEndDate, vac_reason vacReason FROM edoc_vacation WHERE edoc_num = #{edocNum}
SELECT project_title projectTitle, project_content projectContent, project_estimate projectExtimate FROM edoc_project WHERE edoc_num = #{edocNum}
SELECT event_type eventType, DATE_FORMAT(event_date,'%Y년 %m월 %d일') eventDate, event_place eventPlace, event_expense eventExpense FROM edoc_event WHERE edoc_num = #{edocNum}
SELECT report_type reportType, report_content reportContent FROM edoc_report WHERE edoc_num = #{edocNum}
SELECT emp_kor_name empKorName FROM emp WHERE emp_code = #{empCode}
